articles.title: India and Pakistan Edge Toward a Conflict Neither Can Afford - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: India and Pakistan are the closest they’ve been to military conflict in years following last month’s devastating attack on Indian tourists in Kashmir. The turmoil couldn’t come at a worse time for the economies of the two nuclear-armed nations.
